verses.verse: ALEPH. Blessed <WH835> are the undefiled <WH8549> in the way <WH1870>, who walk <WH1980> <WH8802> in the Torah <WH8451> of the YY <WH3068>.
Blessed <WH835> are they that keep <WH5341> <WH8802> his testimonies <WH5713>, and that seek <WH1875> <WH8799> him with the whole heart <WH3820>.
They also do <WH6466> <WH8804> no iniquity <WH5766>: they walk <WH1980> <WH8804> in his ways <WH1870>.
Thou hast commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> us to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> thy precepts <WH6490> diligently <WH3966>.
O that <WH305> my ways <WH1870> were directed <WH3559> <WH8735> to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> thy statutes <WH2706> !
Then shall I not be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>, when I have respect <WH5027> <WH8687> unto all thy Mitzvot <WH4687>.
I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee with uprightness <WH3476> of heart <WH3824>, when I shall have learned <WH3925> <WH8800> thy righteous <WH6664> judgments <WH4941>.
I will keep <WH8104> <WH8799> thy statutes <WH2706>: O forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> me not utterly <WH3966>.
BETH. Wherewithal shall a young man <WH5288> cleanse <WH2135> <WH8762> his way <WH734>? by taking heed <WH8104> <WH8800> thereto according to thy word <WH1697>.
With my whole heart <WH3820> have I sought <WH1875> <WH8804> thee: O let me not wander <WH7686> <WH8686> from thy Mitzvot <WH4687>.
Thy word <WH565> have I hid <WH6845> <WH8804> in mine heart <WH3820>, that I might not sin <WH2398> <WH8799> against thee.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> art thou, O YY <WH3068>: teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
With my lips <WH8193> have I declared <WH5608> <WH8765> all the judgments <WH4941> of thy mouth <WH6310>.
I have rejoiced <WH7797> <WH8804> in the way <WH1870> of thy testimonies <WH5715>, as much as in <WH5921> all riches <WH1952>.
I will meditate <WH7878> <WH8799> in thy precepts <WH6490>, and have respect <WH5027> <WH8686> unto thy ways <WH734>.
I will delight <WH8173> <WH8698> myself in thy statutes <WH2708>: I will not forget <WH7911> <WH8799> thy word <WH1697>.
GIMEL. Deal bountifully <WH1580> <WH8798> with thy servant <WH5650>, that I may live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8799> thy word <WH1697>.
Open <WH1540> <WH8761> thou mine eyes <WH5869>, that I may behold <WH5027> <WH8686> wondrous things <WH6381> <WH8737> out of thy Torah <WH8451>.
I am a stranger <WH1616> in the earth <WH776>: hide <WH5641> <WH8686> not thy Mitzvot <WH4687> from me.
My soul <WH5315> breaketh <WH1638> <WH8804> for the longing <WH8375> that it hath unto thy judgments <WH4941> at all times <WH6256>.
Thou hast rebuked <WH1605> <WH8804> the proud <WH2086> that are cursed <WH779> <WH8803>, which do err <WH7686> <WH8802> from thy Mitzvot <WH4687>.
Remove <WH1556> <WH8798> from me reproach <WH2781> and contempt <WH937>; for I have kept <WH5341> <WH8804> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
Princes <WH8269> also did sit <WH3427> <WH8804> and speak <WH1696> <WH8738> against me: but thy servant <WH5650> did meditate <WH7878> <WH8799> in thy statutes <WH2706>.
Thy testimonies <WH5713> also are my delight <WH8191> and my counsellors <WH582> <WH6098>.
DALETH. My soul <WH5315> cleaveth <WH1692> <WH8804> unto the dust <WH6083>: quicken <WH2421> <WH8761> thou me according to thy word <WH1697>.
I have declared <WH5608> <WH8765> my ways <WH1870>, and thou heardest <WH6030> <WH8799> me: teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
Make me to understand <WH995> <WH8685> the way <WH1870> of thy precepts <WH6490>: so shall I talk <WH7878> <WH8799> of thy wondrous works <WH6381> <WH8737>.
My soul <WH5315> melteth <WH1811> <WH8804> for heaviness <WH8424>: strengthen <WH6965> <WH8761> thou me according unto thy word <WH1697>.
Remove <WH5493> <WH8685> from me the way <WH1870> of lying <WH8267>: and grant me thy Torah <WH8451> graciously <WH2603> <WH8798>.
I have chosen <WH977> <WH8804> the way <WH1870> of truth <WH530>: thy judgments <WH4941> have I laid <WH7737> <WH8765> before me.
I have stuck <WH1692> <WH8804> unto thy testimonies <WH5715>: O YY <WH3068>, put me not to shame <WH954> <WH8686>.
I will run <WH7323> <WH8799> the way <WH1870> of thy Mitzvot <WH4687>, when thou shalt enlarge <WH7337> <WH8686> my heart <WH3820>.
HE. Teach <WH3384> <WH8685> me, O YY <WH3068>, the way <WH1870> of thy statutes <WH2706>; and I shall keep <WH5341> <WH8799> it unto the end <WH6118>.
Give me understanding <WH995> <WH8685>, and I shall keep <WH5341> <WH8799> thy Torah <WH8451>; yea, I shall observe <WH8104> <WH8799> it with my whole heart <WH3820>.
Make me to go <WH1869> <WH8685> in the path <WH5410> of thy Mitzvot <WH4687>; for therein do I delight <WH2654> <WH8804>.
Incline <WH5186> <WH8685> my heart <WH3820> unto thy testimonies <WH5715>, and not to covetousness <WH1215>.
Turn away <WH5674> <WH8685> mine eyes <WH5869> from beholding <WH7200> <WH8800> vanity <WH7723>; and quicken <WH2421> <WH8761> thou me in thy way <WH1870>.
Stablish <WH6965> <WH8685> thy word <WH565> unto thy servant <WH5650>, who is devoted to thy fear <WH3374>.
Turn away <WH5674> <WH8685> my reproach <WH2781> which I fear <WH3025> <WH8804>: for thy judgments <WH4941> are good <WH2896>.
Behold, I have longed <WH8373> <WH8804> after thy precepts <WH6490>: quicken <WH2421> <WH8761> me in thy righteousness <WH6666>.
VAU. Let thy mercies <WH2617> come <WH935> <WH8799> also unto me, O YY <WH3068>, even thy salvation <WH8668>, according to thy word <WH565>.
So shall I have wherewith <WH1697> to answer <WH6030> <WH8799> him that reproacheth <WH2778> <WH8802> me: for I trust <WH982> <WH8804> in thy word <WH1697>.
And take <WH5337> <WH8686> not the word <WH1697> of truth <WH571> utterly <WH3966> out of my mouth <WH6310>; for I have hoped <WH3176> <WH8765> in thy judgments <WH4941>.
So shall I keep <WH8104> <WH8799> thy Torah <WH8451> continually <WH8548> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.
And I will walk <WH1980> <WH8691> at liberty <WH7342>: for I seek <WH1875> <WH8804> thy precepts <WH6490>.
I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762> of thy testimonies <WH5713> also before kings <WH4428>, and will not be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>.
And I will delight <WH8173> <WH8698> myself in thy Mitzvot <WH4687>, which I have loved <WH157> <WH8804>.
My hands <WH3709> also will I lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> unto thy Mitzvot <WH4687>, which I have loved <WH157> <WH8804>; and I will meditate <WH7878> <WH8799> in thy statutes <WH2706>.
ZAIN. Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> the word <WH1697> unto thy servant <WH5650>, upon which thou hast caused me to hope <WH3176> <WH8765>.
This is my comfort <WH5165> in my affliction <WH6040>: for thy word <WH565> hath quickened <WH2421> <WH8765> me.
The proud <WH2086> have had me greatly <WH3966> in derision <WH3887> <WH8689>: yet have I not declined <WH5186> <WH8804> from thy Torah <WH8451>.
I remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> thy judgments <WH4941> of old <WH5769>, O YY <WH3068>; and have comforted <WH5162> <WH8691> myself.
Horror <WH2152> hath taken hold <WH270> <WH8804> upon me because of the wicked <WH7563> that forsake <WH5800> <WH8802> thy Torah <WH8451>.
Thy statutes <WH2706> have been my songs <WH2158> in the house <WH1004> of my pilgrimage <WH4033>.
I have remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> thy name <WH8034>, O YY <WH3068>, in the night <WH3915>, and have kept <WH8104> <WH8799> thy Torah <WH8451>.
This I had, because I kept <WH5341> <WH8804> thy precepts <WH6490>.
CHETH. Thou art my portion <WH2506>, O YY <WH3068>: I have said <WH559> <WH8804> that I would keep <WH8104> <WH8800> thy words <WH1697>.
I intreated <WH2470> <WH8765> thy favour <WH6440> with my whole heart <WH3820>: be merciful <WH2603> <WH8798> unto me according to thy word <WH565>.
I thought <WH2803> <WH8765> on my ways <WH1870>, and turned <WH7725> <WH8686> my feet <WH7272> unto thy testimonies <WH5713>.
I made haste <WH2363> <WH8804>, and delayed <WH4102> <WH8701> not to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> thy Mitzvot <WH4687>.
The bands <WH2256> of the wicked <WH7563> have robbed <WH5749> <WH8765> me: but I have not forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> thy Torah <WH8451>.
At midnight <WH2676> <WH3915> I will rise <WH6965> <WH8799> to give thanks <WH3034> <WH8687> unto thee because of thy righteous <WH6664> judgments <WH4941>.
I am a companion <WH2270> of all them that fear <WH3372> <WH8804> thee, and of them that keep <WH8104> <WH8802> thy precepts <WH6490>.
The earth <WH776>, O YY <WH3068>, is full <WH4390> <WH8804> of thy mercy <WH2617>: teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
TETH. Thou hast dealt <WH6213> <WH8804> well <WH2896> with thy servant <WH5650>, O YY <WH3068>, according unto thy word <WH1697>.
Teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me good <WH2898> judgment <WH2940> and knowledge <WH1847>: for I have believed <WH539> <WH8689> thy Mitzvot <WH4687>.
Before I was afflicted <WH6031> <WH8799> I went astray <WH7683> <WH8802>: but now have I kept <WH8104> <WH8804> thy word <WH565>.
Thou art good <WH2896>, and doest good <WH2895> <WH8688>; teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
The proud <WH2086> have forged <WH2950> <WH8804> a lie <WH8267> against me: but I will keep <WH5341> <WH8799> thy precepts <WH6490> with my whole heart <WH3820>.
Their heart <WH3820> is as fat <WH2954> <WH8804> as grease <WH2459>; but I delight <WH8173> <WH8773> in thy Torah <WH8451>.
It is good <WH2896> for me that I have been afflicted <WH6031> <WH8795>; that I might learn <WH3925> <WH8799> thy statutes <WH2706>.
The Torah <WH8451> of thy mouth <WH6310> is better <WH2896> unto me than thousands <WH505> of gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701>.
JOD. Thy hands <WH3027> have made <WH6213> <WH8804> me and fashioned <WH3559> <WH8787> me: give me understanding <WH995> <WH8685>, that I may learn <WH3925> <WH8799> thy Mitzvot <WH4687>.
They that fear <WH3373> thee will be glad <WH8055> <WH8799> when they see <WH7200> <WH8799> me; because I have hoped <WH3176> <WH8765> in thy word <WH1697>.
I know <WH3045> <WH8804>, O YY <WH3068>, that thy judgments <WH4941> are right <WH6664>, and that thou in faithfulness <WH530> hast afflicted <WH6031> <WH8765> me.
Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness <WH2617> be for my comfort <WH5162> <WH8763>, according to thy word <WH565> unto thy servant <WH5650>.
Let thy tender mercies <WH7356> come <WH935> <WH8799> unto me, that I may live <WH2421> <WH8799>: for thy Torah <WH8451> is my delight <WH8191>.
Let the proud <WH2086> be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>; for they dealt perversely <WH5791> <WH8765> with me without a cause <WH8267>: but I will meditate <WH7878> <WH8799> in thy precepts <WH6490>.
Let those that fear <WH3373> thee turn <WH7725> <WH8799> unto me, and those that have known <WH3045> <WH8802> <WH8675> <WH3045> <WH8804> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
Let my heart <WH3820> be sound <WH8549> in thy statutes <WH2706>; that I be not ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>.
CAPH. My soul <WH5315> fainteth <WH3615> <WH8804> for thy salvation <WH8668>: but I hope <WH3176> <WH8765> in thy word <WH1697>.
Mine eyes <WH5869> fail <WH3615> <WH8804> for thy word <WH565>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, When wilt thou comfort <WH5162> <WH8762> me?
For I am become like a bottle <WH4997> in the smoke <WH7008>; yet do I not forget <WH7911> <WH8804> thy statutes <WH2706>.
How many are the days <WH3117> of thy servant <WH5650>? when wilt thou execute <WH6213> <WH8799> judgment <WH4941> on them that persecute <WH7291> <WH8802> me?
The proud <WH2086> have digged <WH3738> <WH8804> pits <WH7882> for me, which are not after thy Torah <WH8451>.
All thy Mitzvot <WH4687> are faithful <WH530>: they persecute <WH7291> <WH8804> me wrongfully <WH8267>; help <WH5826> <WH8798> thou me.
They had almost <WH4592> consumed <WH3615> <WH8765> me upon earth <WH776>; but I forsook <WH5800> <WH8804> not thy precepts <WH6490>.
Quicken <WH2421> <WH8761> me after thy lovingkindness <WH2617>; so shall I keep <WH8104> <WH8799> the testimony <WH5715> of thy mouth <WH6310>.
LAMED. For ever <WH5769>, O YY <WH3068>, thy word <WH1697> is settled <WH5324> <WH8737> in heaven <WH8064>.
Thy faithfulness <WH530> is unto all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>: thou hast established <WH3559> <WH8790> the earth <WH776>, and it abideth <WH5975> <WH8799>.
They continue <WH5975> <WH8804> this day <WH3117> according to thine ordinances <WH4941>: for all are thy servants <WH5650>.
Unless <WH3884> thy Torah <WH8451> had been my delights <WH8191>, I should then have perished <WH6> <WH8804> in mine affliction <WH6040>.
I will never <WH5769> forget <WH7911> <WH8799> thy precepts <WH6490>: for with them thou hast quickened <WH2421> <WH8765> me.
I am thine, save <WH3467> <WH8685> me; for I have sought <WH1875> <WH8804> thy precepts <WH6490>.
The wicked <WH7563> have waited <WH6960> <WH8765> for me to destroy <WH6> <WH8763> me: but I will consider <WH995> <WH8709> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> an end <WH7093> of all perfection <WH8502>: but thy Mitzvah <WH4687> is exceeding <WH3966> broad <WH7342>.
MEM. O how love I <WH157> <WH8804> thy Torah <WH8451> ! it is my meditation <WH7881> all the day <WH3117>.
Thou through thy Mitzvot <WH4687> hast made me wiser <WH2449> <WH8762> than mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>: for they are ever <WH5769> with me.
I have more understanding <WH7919> <WH8689> than all my teachers <WH3925> <WH8764>: for thy testimonies <WH5715> are my meditation <WH7881>.
I understand <WH995> <WH8709> more than the ancients <WH2205>, because I keep <WH5341> <WH8804> thy precepts <WH6490>.
I have refrained <WH3607> <WH8804> my feet <WH7272> from every evil <WH7451> way <WH734>, that I might keep <WH8104> <WH8799> thy word <WH1697>.
I have not departed <WH5493> <WH8804> from thy judgments <WH4941>: for thou hast taught <WH3384> <WH8689> me.
How sweet <WH4452> <WH8738> are thy words <WH565> unto my taste <WH2441> ! yea, sweeter than honey <WH1706> to my mouth <WH6310> !
Through thy precepts <WH6490> I get understanding <WH995> <WH8709>: therefore I hate <WH8130> <WH8804> every false <WH8267> way <WH734>.
NUN. Thy word <WH1697> is a Menorah <WH5216> unto my feet <WH7272>, and a light <WH216> unto my path <WH5410>.
I have sworn <WH7650> <WH8738>, and I will perform <WH6965> <WH8762> it, that I will keep <WH8104> <WH8800> thy righteous <WH6664> judgments <WH4941>.
I am afflicted <WH6031> <WH8738> very much <WH3966>: quicken <WH2421> <WH8761> me, O YY <WH3068>, according unto thy word <WH1697>.
Accept <WH7521> <WH8798>, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings <WH5071> of my mouth <WH6310>, O YY <WH3068>, and teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me thy judgments <WH4941>.
My soul <WH5315> is continually <WH8548> in my hand <WH3709>: yet do I not forget <WH7911> <WH8804> thy Torah <WH8451>.
The wicked <WH7563> have laid <WH5414> <WH8804> a snare <WH6341> for me: yet I erred <WH8582> <WH8804> not from thy precepts <WH6490>.
Thy testimonies <WH5715> have I taken as an heritage <WH5157> <WH8804> for ever <WH5769>: for they are the rejoicing <WH8342> of my heart <WH3820>.
I have inclined <WH5186> <WH8804> mine heart <WH3820> to perform <WH6213> <WH8800> thy statutes <WH2706> alway <WH5769>, even unto the end <WH6118>.
SAMECH. I hate <WH8130> <WH8804> vain thoughts <WH5588>: but thy Torah <WH8451> do I love <WH157> <WH8804>.
Thou art my hiding place <WH5643> and my shield <WH4043>: I hope <WH3176> <WH8765> in thy word <WH1697>.
Depart <WH5493> <WH8798> from me, ye evildoers <WH7489> <WH8688>: for I will keep <WH5341> <WH8799> the Mitzvot <WH4687> of my 'Elohim <WH430>.
Uphold <WH5564> <WH8798> me according unto thy word <WH565>, that I may live <WH2421> <WH8799>: and let me not be ashamed <WH954> <WH8686> of my hope <WH7664>.
Hold thou me up <WH5582> <WH8798>, and I shall be safe <WH3467> <WH8735>: and I will have respect <WH8159> <WH8799> unto thy statutes <WH2706> continually <WH8548>.
Thou hast trodden down <WH5541> <WH8804> all them that err <WH7686> <WH8802> from thy statutes <WH2706>: for their deceit <WH8649> is falsehood <WH8267>.
Thou puttest away <WH7673> <WH8689> all the wicked <WH7563> of the earth <WH776> like dross <WH5509>: therefore I love <WH157> <WH8804> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
My flesh <WH1320> trembleth <WH5568> <WH8804> for fear <WH6343> of thee; and I am afraid <WH3372> <WH8804> of thy judgments <WH4941>.
AIN. I have done <WH6213> <WH8804> judgment <WH4941> and justice <WH6664>: leave <WH3240> <WH8686> me not to mine oppressors <WH6231> <WH8802>.
Be surety <WH6148> <WH8798> for thy servant <WH5650> for good <WH2896>: let not the proud <WH2086> oppress <WH6231> <WH8799> me.
Mine eyes <WH5869> fail <WH3615> <WH8804> for thy salvation <WH3444>, and for the word <WH565> of thy righteousness <WH6664>.
Deal <WH6213> <WH8798> with thy servant <WH5650> according unto thy mercy <WH2617>, and teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
I am thy servant <WH5650>; give me understanding <WH995> <WH8685>, that I may know <WH3045> <WH8799> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
It is time <WH6256> for thee, YY <WH3068>, to work <WH6213> <WH8800>: for they have made void <WH6565> <WH8689> thy Torah <WH8451>.
Therefore I love <WH157> <WH8804> thy Mitzvot <WH4687> above gold <WH2091>; yea, above fine gold <WH6337>.
Therefore I esteem all thy precepts <WH6490> concerning all things to be right <WH3474> <WH8765>; and I hate <WH8130> <WH8804> every false <WH8267> way <WH734>.
PE. Thy testimonies <WH5715> are wonderful <WH6382>: therefore doth my soul <WH5315> keep <WH5341> <WH8804> them.
The entrance <WH6608> of thy words <WH1697> giveth light <WH215> <WH8686>; it giveth understanding <WH995> <WH8688> unto the simple <WH6612>.
I opened <WH6473> <WH8804> my mouth <WH6310>, and panted <WH7602> <WH8799>: for I longed <WH2968> <WH8804> for thy Mitzvot <WH4687>.
Look <WH6437> <WH8798> thou upon me, and be merciful <WH2603> <WH8798> unto me, as thou usest <WH4941> to do unto those that love <WH157> <WH8802> thy name <WH8034>.
Order <WH3559> <WH8685> my steps <WH6471> in thy word <WH565>: and let not any iniquity <WH205> have dominion <WH7980> <WH8686> over me.
Deliver <WH6299> <WH8798> me from the oppression <WH6233> of man <WH120>: so will I keep <WH8104> <WH8799> thy precepts <WH6490>.
Make thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> <WH8685> upon thy servant <WH5650>; and teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me thy statutes <WH2706>.
Rivers <WH6388> of waters <WH4325> run down <WH3381> <WH8804> mine eyes <WH5869>, because they keep <WH8104> <WH8804> not thy Torah <WH8451>.
TZADDI. Righteous <WH6662> art thou, O YY <WH3068>, and upright <WH3477> are thy judgments <WH4941>.
Thy testimonies <WH5713> that thou hast commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> are righteous <WH6664> and very <WH3966> faithful <WH530>.
My zeal <WH7068> hath consumed <WH6789> <WH8765> me, because mine enemies <WH6862> have forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> thy words <WH1697>.
Thy word <WH565> is very <WH3966> pure <WH6884> <WH8803>: therefore thy servant <WH5650> loveth <WH157> <WH8804> it.
I am small <WH6810> and despised <WH959> <WH8737>: yet do not I forget <WH7911> <WH8804> thy precepts <WH6490>.
Thy righteousness <WH6666> is an everlasting <WH5769> righteousness <WH6664>, and thy Torah <WH8451> is the truth <WH571>.
Trouble <WH6862> and anguish <WH4689> have taken hold <WH4672> <WH8804> on me: yet thy Mitzvot <WH4687> are my delights <WH8191>.
The righteousness <WH6664> of thy testimonies <WH5715> is everlasting <WH5769>: give me understanding <WH995> <WH8685>, and I shall live <WH2421> <WH8799>.
KOPH. I cried <WH7121> <WH8804> with my whole heart <WH3820>; hear <WH6030> <WH8798> me, O YY <WH3068>: I will keep <WH5341> <WH8799> thy statutes <WH2706>.
I cried <WH7121> <WH8804> unto thee; save <WH3467> <WH8685> me, and I shall keep <WH8104> <WH8799> thy testimonies <WH5713>.
I prevented <WH6923> <WH8765> the dawning of the morning <WH5399>, and cried <WH7768> <WH8762>: I hoped <WH3176> <WH8765> in thy word <WH1697>.
Mine eyes <WH5869> prevent <WH6923> <WH8765> the night watches <WH821>, that I might meditate <WH7878> <WH8800> in thy word <WH565>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my voice <WH6963> according unto thy lovingkindness <WH2617>: O YY <WH3068>, quicken <WH2421> <WH8761> me according to thy judgment <WH4941>.
They draw nigh <WH7126> <WH8804> that follow <WH7291> <WH8802> after mischief <WH2154>: they are far <WH7368> <WH8804> from thy Torah <WH8451>.
Thou art near <WH7138>, O YY <WH3068>; and all thy Mitzvot <WH4687> are truth <WH571>.
Concerning thy testimonies <WH5713>, I have known <WH3045> <WH8804> of old <WH6924> that thou hast founded <WH3245> <WH8804> them for ever <WH5769>.
RESH. Consider <WH7200> <WH8798> mine affliction <WH6040>, and deliver <WH2502> <WH8761> me: for I do not forget <WH7911> <WH8804> thy Torah <WH8451>.
Plead <WH7378> <WH8798> my cause <WH7379>, and deliver <WH1350> <WH8798> me: quicken <WH2421> <WH8761> me according to thy word <WH565>.
Salvation <WH3444> is far <WH7350> from the wicked <WH7563>: for they seek <WH1875> <WH8804> not thy statutes <WH2706>.
